12345678907.author: Abhimanyu Ghoshal
12345678907.title: Facebook launches Express Wi-Fi in India to bring rural areas online
12345678907.description: After a failed effort to offer free internet access (with strings attached) to people in India, Facebook has now launched Express Wi-Fi, a service that lets users log on to Wi-Fi networks ...
12345678907.scrapeDetails: After a failed effort to offer free internet access (with strings attached) to people in India, Facebook has now launched Express Wi-Fi, a service that lets users log on to Wi-Fi networks
